title: PESSAT Cutoff
content: Can someone please say around what rank did CSE at RR Campus close last year through PESSAT? I got around 1490 rank in PESSAT, I wanted to know whether I should attend the 2nd round of counselling. I had taken AI-ML branch through 1st round at RR Campus. If anyone is aware please do help.

comments.body:
Search for pessat in this sub 

And you'll find your answer in the megathread

Last year, fall in cutoff from round 1 to round 2 was 392 ranks. So if the same repeats this year, CSE in RR should close at rank 1433. (This is purely speculative)

So I'd say you should attend the counselling, while keeping low expectations. If you end up getting it, great. If not, there'll be no harm done.
It is going from 700 to 1k when I took admission all the way to 1400.
Is possible 6k rank can get pessat cae seat in 2nd round counsellingÂ
